summary: Implements the mock EC2 service’s AMI (Amazon Machine Image) model, defining an AMI entity with helper methods for public/private status and a backend that manages the full AMI lifecycle—including loading, copying, creating, registering, deregistering, describing, modifying attributes, and validating permissions and identifiers.
business_intent: Provides a test‑double for AWS EC2 AMI operations so that developers can simulate image management (creation, registration, copying, attribute changes, and permission handling) without contacting the real AWS API.
